response_parsed.title: FastAPI Package for REST APIs in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a comprehensive overview of creating and packaging REST APIs using FastAPI with Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI is a modern, easy-to-use framework for building web APIs in Python.
It supports features like type inference, automatic JSON serialization/deserialization, and more.
Python 3.12+ is the recommended version for using FastAPI's latest features.
The guide covers creating a FastAPI application, testing it locally, and packaging it for distribution.
version_notes: FastAPI version 0.72.0 is recommended for Python 3.12+.
Ensure you have the latest FastAPI and Uvicorn installed via pip:
caveats: Python 3.12+ is a preview release, so be cautious when using it in production.
FastAPI has its own router system, which may deviate from the WSGI standard.
